{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04845v1", "title": "Open problems UP24", "summary": "The conference Unexpected Phenomena in Energy Minimization and Polarization,
held in Sofia, Bulgaria in 2024, provided a platform for researchers to discuss
and propose challenging open questions across various fields, such as potential
theory, approximation, special functions, point configurations, lattices, and
numerical analysis. The open problems sessions were productive, fruitful and
led to a range of interesting questions. In this document, we present these
open problems.", "main_category": "math.CA", "categories": "math.CA,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-07T08:56:48Z"}
